title: Residence Inn Montreal Downtown Guarantees Best Available R
text:
MONTREAL , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Ensuring guests always get the most for their money, Residence Inn Montreal Downtown is enticing fall and holiday travelers with its Best Available Rate Guarantee. Whether heading to town on business or exploring the city and its beautiful fall foliage for leisure, visitors will rest easy knowing they've made the right choice when it comes to accommodations. With Marriott's Best Available Rate Guarantee , guests can be assured they are getting a great rate when they book with Residence Inn Montreal Downtown directly. If guests find a lower available rate within 24 hours of booking, the hotel in Montreal, Quebec will not only match it but also give guests 25 percent off the lower rate, subject to guarantee terms and exclusions. Some terms and conditions apply.  
Recently renovated, the Downtown Montreal hotel offers travelers a modern escape surrounded by the city's popular attractions. Large, contemporary suites are feature rich, chocolate brown furnishings and neutral wall colors, accented with a touch of teal to add a pop of personality. Following a long day, guests can retreat to relaxation by sprawling out in luxurious bedding or warming up with a cup of tea on the couch. Complimentary Wi-Fi and large work desks are present in every suite, allowing visitors to stay well-connected and productive in private. Extended-stay travelers looking to be comforted with a little home cooking can take advantage of a fully equipped kitchen boasting stainless-steel appliances, a full-size refrigerator and plenty of dishes and glassware. 
In the mornings, Montreal visitors can start their day on a high note by indulging in the hotel's complimentary hot breakfast buffet. Featuring a variety of morning favorites including fluffy eggs, crispy bacon, breakfast potatoes, waffles, fresh fruit and cereal, there's something to satisfy every craving. After breakfast, guests can head to the state-of-the-art fitness center and enjoy a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment with personal TV screens, allowing optimal entertainment while staying active. 
Just minutes from the Montreal Business District, Peel Subway, St. Catherine and Crescent streets, the hotel provides convenience for business and leisure travelers alike. During downtime, guests can check out nearby attractions including the Montreal Olympic Stadium, Mount Royal (Lookout), Jean Drapeau Island or join in on one of many sightseeing tours. 
About Residence Inn Montreal Downtown
Residence Inn Montreal Downtown at 2045 Peel St. in Montreal, Quebec, Canada is near McGrill University, Olympic Stadium and Montreal Casino. The hotel features 24 floors with 210 suites, 1 meeting room with 538 square feet and a state-of-the-art fitness center. A free hot breakfast buffet and high-speed Internet access are complimentary. For information, visit www.marriott.com/YULRI or call 1-800-331-3131.
